greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A173108 * the diagonalized variant of A173110
formula: Let triangle A173108 = Q, and M = an infinite lower triangular matrix with A173110 as the rightmost diagonal and the rest zeros. Triangle A173111 = Q*M.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Example: row 7 = termwise products of (877, 52, 5, 1) and (1, 1, 3, 6) =
(1, 1, 3, 6) = the first four terms of sequence A173109.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 09 2010
